name: Ruination (itch) (micksengers, Lunyan64, Gristicle, leopokoyo)
description:
Manage an ancient civilization that’s on the verge of death. Make sure to keep your values just about in the center, lest you face your imminent doom. Interact with events to manipulate every attempt at survival to the greatest extent possible. Create buildings and manage your citizens to lead you to a more successful future.

W A S D to move the camera.

Left click to place.

right click to cancel placing.
